issue.title: [Python] Consider adding option to parquet.write_table that sets options for maximum Spark compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1499](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1499). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These issues should also be appropriately documented in Sphinx.

Something like:

```Java
parquet.write_table(table, where, flavor="spark-2.2")
```

This might allow for others flavors to be added.
